question: Which among the following has highest energy in the Electromagnetic spectrum?
explanation:
Gamma rays of Electromagnetic spectrum has highest energy.Â 
Descending order of energies of different portions of the spectrum: Gamma rays > X rays > Ultraviolet rays > Visible spectrum > Infrared rays > Micro waves > Radio waves.
Extra info: Wavelengths of the above portions of the spectrum is inverse to the energies. eg: Gamma wave has shortest wavelength and radio waves have highest wavelength.
